Reviews.Title: “Fantastic serviced apartments and staff all 5 star”
Reviews.Author: Kir2510
Reviews.Content: The hotel/ serviced apartments were very modern and were fully equipped with all of the amenities that we required for our stay. We were staying in the one bedroom which was compact especially with a baby however was suitable, I would if possible stay in the larger rooms available as they have a bathroom and more space. The staff at The Forest by Wangz were fantastic better than fantastic they went above and beyond to help and make you feel as comfortable as possible (a home from home) We will definitely be staying there again and would recommend to anyone. I found the location acceptable for my situation they had a daily shuttle bus available and also the hotel was very close to the MRT and supermarket.

Reviews.Title: “Very very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: IsabellaSwan22
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and courteous staff, everything was nice and clean. It was very comfortable with the lockers and cabinets, we had a lot of space to store. Ironing board and iron right in the closet and even the hair dryer has not been lacking. Also very convenient because of the kitchen and co. if you can not eat outside its possible cook for your self. Good location, just 5 min to the MRT. Very high recommended. :) Pool was not so private because of a corridor, people who pass can see the whole pool area. Maybe should be covered a bit so you have more privacy while you schwimming.

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: DaruPrakoso
Reviews.Content: I feels like home here..I can relaxed my mind and enjoy my stay here,their service never failed me

Reviews.Title: “The best possible start to life in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: SS_Finland
Reviews.Content: We relocated to Singapore in February 2012. We were looking for a temporary stay until we find a permanent place. We chose The Forest because for such a long stay we wanted to cook fresh meals and also have a bit of space for our children. We arranged with the staff for airport pick-up and it was prompt. Everything was in order when in we arrived. The service was great and personal from Day 1 and we felt really at home. The room was very clean, bright and spacious. The kitchen was well equipped. Two good malls and Novena MRT are in walking distance. We thank all the staff for making our stay memorable :)

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home :)”
Reviews.Author: NavierStokes
Reviews.Content: Great service from super staff. A luxurious bed. Amazing shower. Great location. Satisfies all that a busy traveller needs and wants from a "home" away from home. Cheers guys! See you soon :)

Reviews.Title: “exceptional service in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Myra23
Reviews.Content: We've been staying in this hotel/serviced apartment since the 12th of December, 2011 and we are blown away by the service, not to mention the cleanliness, the safe and quiet neighborhood, seven-minute walk to MRT and two shopping malls, five minute-walk to bus stops, the very satisfying breakfast, the kitchenette and in-our-unit laundry facility. Lorna, Faizal, Omar, Sophil, Asha, Gideon, Cil and Moneera, and all of the staff who's names I missed to mention, thank you so much for making me and my husband feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: JoaoMMC
Reviews.Content: We moved to Singapore 1 month ago, and decided to book The Forest by Wangz as our first accommodation before finding our own place. Could not have made a better choice, since everyone from this hotel/serviced apartments were excellent in every sense. We were very well treated and felt very good since day 1. This hotel is very stylish, very different from most of the hotels in Singapore, and the service is impeccable. It's very quite and close the many amenities, less than 10 minutes walk to the mrt (subway) and malls. Would stay here again without a second thought.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice place to stay in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: PiccadillyLondon
Reviews.Content: These serviced apartments are a refreshing alternative to the usual 'it's Wednesday - must be Singapore' type of hotels. If you are staying for a week or more it's a home away from home as well as offering all the comforts of what one expects from any classy hotel. Very friendly, professional and welcoming staff and lots of attention to details. I would highly recommend staying there and look forward to returning soon! Thank you.

HotelInfo.Name: The Forest by Wangz
HotelInfo.Address: 145A Moulmein Road, Singapore 308108, Singapore
